bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of an inability to completely discharge all urine or ejaculate all semen at once, with a residue dribbling afterwards. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry ku shen 苦參：主心腹結氣，癥瘕積 聚，黃疸，溺有餘瀝 , “It controls bound qi in the heart and abdomen, concretion-illness and conglomeration-illness, accumulations and collections, yellow dan -illness, as well as urinary residual dribbling ”.
